section.name: Overview
section.p: Dalma WebUI is an HTML-based UI on top of Dalmacon. It allows you to run the whole workflow engine inside a web container, and provides configuration, monitoring, and management capabilities.

subsection.name: Installation
subsection.p: Dalma WebUI requires a servlet container that supports Servlet 2.4 / JSP 2.0 running on Java 5 or later. This includes Tomcat 5, Jetty 5, or any of the J2EE 1.4 (or later) application servers, including Glassfish, Apache Geronimo 1.x, and JBoss 4.x.
To install Dalm WebUI to the web container, simply download the war file and deploy it.
